title: Mad Dog & Glory_(1993)[.AVI]

Title: Mad Dog & Glory

Released: 1993
Length: 01:36:47
Size: 652MB
Genre: Crime, Drama, Comedy

Plot: A New York detective working as a homicide photographer saves the life of a standup comic connected to the Mob. As repayment for his heroic act Frank (Bill Murray) loans Wayne 'Mad Dog' (Robert De Niro) a beautiful young woman
to care for his loneliness. Wayne's reluctance quickly changes to submissiveness and sex as he develops feelings for Glory (Uma Thurman). However, Glory is Frank's personal property and Wayne must contend with the outcome of going against the Mob's wishes.


Starring: Robert De Niro, Bill Murray, Uma Thurman, David Caruso, Mike Starr and Kathy Baker.
